text: @chuckwoolery You clearly stated that COVID-19 was a lie. If you didn't mean it was a hoax, then say what you mean and mean what you say. Words matter. If you don't trust the CDC or medical professionals, who exactly are you trusting? Our constantly lying president? Please, don't ingest bleach

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
